query: SELECT name, statement, parameter_types, result_types FROM pg_prepared_statements
PREPARE q1 AS SELECT 1 AS a
PREPARE q2 AS SELECT 2 AS b
PREPARE q2(text) AS SELECT datname, datistemplate, datallowconn FROM pg_database WHERE datname = $1
expected: PREPARE q2 ( TEXT ) AS SELECT datname, datistemplate, datallowconn FROM pg_database WHERE datname = $1

query: PREPARE q3(text, int, float, boolean, smallint) AS SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE string4 = $1 AND (four = $2 OR ten = $3::bigint OR true = $4 OR odd = $5::int) ORDER BY unique1
expected: PREPARE q3 ( TEXT, INT, FLOAT8, BOOLEAN, SMALLINT ) AS SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE string4 = $1 AND (four = $2 OR ten = CAST($3 AS BIGINT) OR TRUE = $4 OR odd = CAST($5 AS INT)) ORDER BY unique1
EXECUTE q3 ( 'AAAAxx', CAST(5 AS SMALLINT), CAST(10.5 AS FLOAT8), FALSE, CAST(4 AS BIGINT) )
EXECUTE q3 ( 'bytea', CAST(5 AS SMALLINT), CAST(10.5 AS FLOAT8), FALSE, CAST(4 AS BIGINT), TRUE )
EXECUTE q3 ( CAST(5 AS SMALLINT), CAST(10.5 AS FLOAT8), FALSE, CAST(4 AS BIGINT), 'bytea' )

query: PREPARE q5(int, text) AS SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE unique1 = $1 OR stringu1 = $2 ORDER BY unique1
expected: PREPARE q5 ( INT, TEXT ) AS SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE unique1 = $1 OR stringu1 = $2 ORDER BY unique1

query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE q5_prep_results AS EXECUTE q5(200, 'DTAAAA')
expected: CREATE TEMP TABLE q5_prep_results AS EXECUTE q5 ( 200, 'DTAAAA' )

query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE q5_prep_nodata AS EXECUTE q5(200, 'DTAAAA') WITH NO DATA
expected: CREATE TEMP TABLE q5_prep_nodata AS EXECUTE q5 ( 200, 'DTAAAA' ) WITH NO DATA

query: PREPARE q6 AS SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE unique1 = $1 AND stringu1 = $2
PREPARE q7(unknown) AS SELECT * FROM road WHERE thepath = $1
expected: PREPARE q7 ( unknown ) AS SELECT * FROM road WHERE thepath = $1

query: PREPARE q8 AS UPDATE tenk1 SET stringu1 = $2 WHERE unique1 = $1
SELECT name, statement, parameter_types, result_types FROM pg_prepared_statements ORDER BY name
SELECT name, statement, parameter_types FROM pg_prepared_statements ORDER BY name
